text: Hopea sangal is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, Singapore, and Thailand. This tree is listed as Critically Endangered by the IUCN and is threatened by ongoing timber harvesting. ==References== sangal Category:Trees of Myanmar Category:Trees of Thailand Category:Trees of Malesia Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea sangal
